## CONFIRMATION\_DIALOG\_DATA variable

Injection token used for setting global default data for confirmation dialog

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
CONFIRMATION_DIALOG_DATA: InjectionToken<ConfirmationDialogData>
```
